title: Provided that higher height may be allowed in case of Integrated Township Project where fire station and fire-fighting facilities are to be constructed / provided
clause_text: Provided that higher height may be allowed in case of Integrated Township Project where fire station and fire-fighting facilities are to be constructed / provided. Also, if such facilities are available in nearby area of the project, then buildings of higher heights may be allowed in such project. However, necessary certificate to that effect and NOC shall be produced from Director of Fire Services.
section: Buildings Abutting Two or More Streets

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
